transArray.content: Very close to the station, breakfast is good

Dear distinguished guest, hello, thank you for your support and affirmation of our work. Our hotel has a Chinese and Western buffet breakfast from 7 to 10 o'clock, which is very rich and delicious. There are also homemade wontons and various Beijing snacks. There are also There is a free laundry room and parking lot, and it is only 800 meters away from Chaoyang Railway Station. It is very convenient. The hotel warmly looks forward to your visit again!
